item.title: The Unknown Browser Extension
item.description: We make use of browser extensions almost every day. It helps us in a variety of ways. Improving productivity, user experience, and the list goes on. It is more than a simple Icon sitting on the top right corner of the browser bar. If you donâ€™t know what a browser extension is, read the description below. A browser extension is a small software application that adds a capacity or functionality to a web browser.
